Metrics.name: Overview
Metrics.description: Comprehensive overview of all metrics tracked on each chain, including TVL, Fees, Revenue, Volume, and protocols on each chain

Metrics.name: Chains
Metrics.description: Combined TVL, Fees, Volume and other metrics by chain

Metrics.name: Categories
Metrics.description: Combined TVL, Revenue and other metrics by category of all protocols that are tracked by DefiLlama

Metrics.name: TVL by Protocol
Metrics.description: Protocols ranked by Total Value Locked in their smart contracts

Metrics.name: TVL by Chain
Metrics.description: Chains ranked by combined TVL of all protocols on the chain

Metrics.name: Top Protocols
Metrics.description: Overview of top protocols with the highest TVL by chain on each category

Metrics.name: Bridged TVL by Chain
Metrics.description: Value of all tokens held on the chain

Metrics.name: Oracles
Metrics.description: Total Value Secured by an oracle, where oracle failure would lead to a loss equal to TVS

Metrics.name: Forks
Metrics.description: Sum of TVL across all forks of a protocol

Metrics.name: TVL Breakdown by Smart Contract Languages
Metrics.description: TVL breakdown by languages that the smart contracts are written in

Metrics.name: Total Borrowed by Protocol
Metrics.description: Sum of value currently borrowed across all active loans on a lending protocol

Metrics.name: Total Staked by Protocol
Metrics.description: Total value of the protocol's own tokens staked on their platform

Metrics.name: Pool2 TVL by Protocol
Metrics.description: Total value locked in pool2 of a protocol

Metrics.name: Yields: All Pools
Metrics.description: Pools by APY, TVL, and other metrics on all chains

Metrics.name: Yields: Stablecoin Pools
Metrics.description: APYs of pools with stablecoins

Metrics.name: Yields: Delta Neutral Strategies
Metrics.description: Find 'lend-borrow-farm' strategies across all our tracked pools

Metrics.name: Yields: Leveraged Lending
Metrics.description: Pools by leveraged lending APY values

Metrics.name: Yields: Long/Short Strategies
Metrics.description: Find 'long-short' strategies across all our tracked pools

Metrics.name: Yields: All Projects
Metrics.description: List of all projects that we track in our yields section

Metrics.name: Yields: APY Overview
Metrics.description: Find APY trends, volatility, and other metrics across all our tracked pools

Metrics.name: Yields: Halal
Metrics.description: Shariah-compliant yield pools

Metrics.name: Revenue by Protocol
Metrics.description: Subset of fees that the protocol collects for itself, usually going to the protocol treasury, the team, or distributed among token holders. This doesn't include any fees distributed to liquidity providers

Metrics.name: Fees by Protocol
Metrics.description: Total fees paid by users when using the protocol

Metrics.name: Holders Revenue by Protocol
Metrics.description: Subset of revenue that is distributed to token holders by means of buyback and burn, burning fees or direct distribution to stakers

Metrics.name: Earnings by Protocol
Metrics.description: Net revenue retained by the protocol after subtracting token incentives distributed to users. Calculated as Revenue minus Incentives (emissions paid out through liquidity mining, farming programs, or similar rewards). Reflects the actual economic value accrued to the protocol itself

Metrics.name: Fees by Chain
Metrics.description: Total fees paid by users when using the chain

Metrics.name: Revenue by Chain
Metrics.description: Subset of fees that the chain collects for itself

Metrics.name: P/F by Protocol
Metrics.description: Market cap / annualized fees

Metrics.name: P/S by Protocol
Metrics.description: Market cap / annualized revenue

Metrics.name: REV by Chain
Metrics.description: Sum of chain fees and MEV tips

Metrics.name: App Revenue by Chain
Metrics.description: Sum of all revenue earned by the apps on the chain. Excludes stablecoins, liquid staking apps, and gas fees

Metrics.name: DEX Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Volume of all spot token swaps that go through a DEX

Metrics.name: Perp Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Notional volume of all trades in a perp exchange, includes leverage

Metrics.name: Bridge Aggregator Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Sum of the value of all assets that were bridged through a bridge aggregator

Metrics.name: DEX Volume by Chain
Metrics.description: Sum of all volume of spot token swaps that go through all DEXs on the chain

Metrics.name: DEX Aggregator Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Volume of spot token swaps that go through a DEX aggregator

Metrics.name: Perp Volume by Chain
Metrics.description: Sum of notional volume of all trades in all perp exchanges on the chain, includes leverage

Metrics.name: Options Premium Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Sum of value paid buying and selling options

Metrics.name: Options Notional Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Sum of the notional value of all options that have been traded on options exchanges

Metrics.name: Open Interest by Protocol
Metrics.description: Total notional value of all outstanding perpetual futures positions

Metrics.name: Perp Aggregator Volume by Protocol
Metrics.description: Notional volume of all trades in a perp aggregator, includes leverage

Metrics.name: Stablecoins by Market Cap
Metrics.description: Total market cap of stable assets

Metrics.name: Stablecoin Supply by Chain
Metrics.description: Total market cap of stable assets currently deployed on each chain

Metrics.name: Airdrops
Metrics.description: Tokenless protocols that may airdrop tokens to their users

Metrics.name: Unlocks Overview
Metrics.description: Overview of token emissions by protocol

Metrics.name: Unlocks Calendar
Metrics.description: Upcoming total token emissions by date

Metrics.name: Protocols by Market Cap
Metrics.description: Token price multiplied by circulating supply of each protocol

Metrics.name: Protocols by FDV
Metrics.description: Token price multiplied by fully diluted supply of each protocol

Metrics.name: Protocols by Outstanding FDV
Metrics.description: Token price multiplied by outstanding supply of each protocol. Outstanding supply is the total supply minus the supply that is not yet allocated to anything (e.g., coins in treasury or reserve)

Metrics.name: Bridges by Volume
Metrics.description: Sum of the value of all assets that were bridged through the protocol

Metrics.name: Bridge Volume by Chain
Metrics.description: Sum of the value of all assets that were bridged through the protocol on each chain

Metrics.name: Treasuries
Metrics.description: Value of tokens owned by a protocol, including its own token and breakdown of assets held

Metrics.name: Net Project Treasury
Metrics.description: Value of tokens owned by a protocol, excluding its own token

Metrics.name: Raises: Overview
Metrics.description: Total amount of capital raised by a project

Metrics.name: Investors
Metrics.description: List of investors that have invested in a project

Metrics.name: Borrow Aggregator: Simple
Metrics.description: Simple view of optimal lending routes by collateral to borrow assets

Metrics.name: Borrow Aggregator: Advanced
Metrics.description: Advanced view of optimal lending routes by collateral to borrow assets

Metrics.name: Hacks: Overview
Metrics.description: Overview of all hacks that have happened in the ecosystem

Metrics.name: Total Value Lost in Hacks by Protocol
Metrics.description: Net user loss, total value lost in hacks by a protocol

Metrics.name: NFTs: Collections
Metrics.description: Overview of all NFT collections

Metrics.name: NFTs: Marketplaces
Metrics.description: Overview of all NFT marketplaces

Metrics.name: NFTs: Collection Earnings
Metrics.description: Earnings of all NFT collections that are tracked by DefiLlama

Metrics.name: NFT Volume by Chain
Metrics.description: Volume of all NFTs that are tracked by DefiLlama traded on the chain

Metrics.name: CEXs
Metrics.description: Sum of assets held on centralized exchanges

Metrics.name: Narrative Trackers
Metrics.description: MCap-Weighted category performance to track narrative changes in the ecosystem

Metrics.name: Staked ETH by Protocol
Metrics.description: Total value of ETH staked on LSTs

Metrics.name: Recently Listed Protocols
Metrics.description: List of recently listed protocols

Metrics.name: Expenses by Protocol
Metrics.description: Breakdown of annual operational expenses by protocol

Metrics.name: ETF
Metrics.description: AUM, Flows, Volume metrics of all ETFs

Metrics.name: Governance
Metrics.description: Overview of all governance proposals by protocol

Tools.description: Custom no-code dashboards with TVL, Fees, Volume, and other metrics

Tools.description: View correlation relationships between different cryptocurrencies to identify market trends and diversification opportunities

Tools.description: Calculate the percentage change in token price between two dates

Tools.name: DeFi Watchlist

Tools.name: Token Liquidity
Tools.description: Check how deep the liquidity is for a given token

Tools.name: Transactions by Bridge
Tools.description: Download transaction data across different time periods by bridge

Tools.name: Protocols Website Directory
Tools.description: Directory of all protocols websites on DefiLlama

Tools.name: Yields: Watchlist
Tools.description: Watchlist of all pools that we track in our yields section

Tools.name: Token Usage by Protocol
Tools.description: View token usage across different protocols

Tools.name: Report Error
Tools.description: Report errors in methodology, protocol metrics, or suggest site improvements

Tools.name: Llama News Round-Up
Tools.description: Recent round-up of the most important news in the ecosystem

Tools.name: LlamaSwap
Tools.description: The Aggregator of Aggregators, LlamaSwap looks for the best route for your trade among a variety of Dex Aggregators, guaranteeing you the best execution prices in DeFi

Tools.name: LlamaPay
Tools.description: DeFi payment processor for salaries, vesting, one-time payments, and subscriptions

Tools.name: LlamaFeed
Tools.description: A real-time, customizable dashboard to keep track of the crypto market in one place

Tools.name: DefiLlama Extension
Tools.description: Browser extension for wallet tags, token pricing, and phishing protection

Tools.name: LlamaSearch Extension
Tools.description: Browser extension for safe crypto domain search and scam prevention

Tools.name: DLNews
Tools.description: An independent news organisation that provides in-depth reporting on the largely misunderstood world of cryptocurrency and decentralised finance
